#labels Phase-Implementation,Phase-Support
#The change history of PyV8

= v0.8 =
==Features==
  * support both the multi-python and multi-javascript thread mode
  * support terminate javascript thread with JSEngine methods: terminateThread/terminateAllThread 
  * support notify v8 the working status with JSEngine methods: dispose/idle/lowMemory
  * support to get call stack from exception with stackTrace attribute
  * build at MAC platform
==Fixed Issues==
  * issue #8 class instance not derived from object returned as Global causes segfault
